title: Meth Inside-Out
description:
Contains 3 Videos

Meth Inside Out - Human Impact
Meth Inside Out - Brain & Behavior
Meth Inside Out - Windows for Recovery

These have been uploaded because 1) they are the best meth ed. videos I have seen which contain the least amount of anti-drug propaganda. and 2) because the producer of the videos is charging over $300 for the set on their website which is impractical for someone hoping to recover from a meth addiction.


Story Line: Meth Inside Out is a groundbreaking video-based treatment curriculum on methamphetamine addiction and recovery. The series is designed to equip meth users, their families, and the professionals who assist them with a solid understanding of the biological basis of addiction, effective tools for recovery, and, most importantly, hope for the future.
